repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript is of Viṣṇupurāṇa. It ends abruptly in the middle of the 6th Amśa 7th chapter 46th verse. The first folio is broken. The first leaf has verses from end of the first chapter and beginning of the 2 chapter of the 1st aṃśa.

msItem.title: Viṣṇupurāṇa
msItem.incipit: [1v 1] yad vyālaṃ visphuṭacārukesarasaṭāsaṃhāraramyākṛtiḥ vakṣo vajraśilaṃ samūhakaṭhinaṃ vistāra devadviṣo bhinnaṃ yena nakhair mudes tu bhagavān de (broken folio)
msItem.explicit: [111v 11 ]... prā [111v 12] ṇāyāmena pavanaiḥ pratyāhāreṇa cendriyaiḥ vaśīkṛtaistataḥ kuryāt sthitañcetaḥ śūbhāśraye khāṇḍikyaḥ kathyatāmme mahābhāga cetaso ya śubhāśrayaḥ

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 36 blank folio and 111 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin but some folio are without foliation.
supportDesc.condition: Some folio have wormwholes. broken folio at the beginning. The blank folio at the end have water patches. Small white fungus spots are seen on the folio.

handNote.desc: Small clear hand writing but due to faint ink and patches of fungus reading is difficult.

additions.desc: Śrīviṣṇupurāṇam is written in the left margin of the first folio.
Number 49 is written on the front guard with pink pencil.

listBibl.bibl: The Critical Edition of the Viṣṇupurāṇam, critically edited by M. M. Pathak. Vadodara : Oriental Institute 1997-1999.

encodingDesc.p: Dots to show continuation of the text.

TEI.text:
[1v 1] yad vyālaṃ visphuṭacārukesarasaṭāsaṃhāraramyākṛtiḥ vakṣo vajraśilaṃ samūhakaṭhinaṃ vistāra devadviṣo bhinnaṃ yena nakhair mudes tu bhagavān de (broken folio) [1v 2] maitreyaḥ paripapraccha praṇipatyābhivādya ca || tvatto hi vedādhyayanam
(part of damaged folio 1v) [1v 2] t prasādāt muni [1v 3] nya taścaitaccarācaraṃ [1v 4] munisattama devādīnāṃ tathā vaṃśān manu
[111v 10] t | prāṇāyāma sa vijñeyassabījo bīja eva ca paraspareṇābhibhavaṃ prāṇāpānyau yadanilau kurutassadvidhānena tṛtīyassaṃyamāttayoḥ tasya cālaṃbanavatassthūlarūpaṃ dvijottama ālaṃbanamanantasya yogi [111v 11] no bhyasatassmṛtaḥ | śabdādiṣvanuraktāni nigṛhyākṣāṇi yogavit kuryāttcittānukārīri pratyāhāraparāyaṇaḥ vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate ticalātmanāṃ indriyāṇāmavaśyaistairna yogī yogasādhanaḥ prā [111v 12] ṇāyāmena pavanaiḥ pratyāhāreṇa cendriyaiḥ vaśīkṛtaistataḥ kuryāt sthitañcetaḥ śūbhāśraye khāṇḍikyaḥ kathyatāmme mahābhāga cetaso ya śubhāśrayaḥ (letters are effaced.)
